explains: v. （使）汇聚，集中；（观点、目标）趋同；（数）收敛

sentences.en: The adult ones converge on remaining portions of healthy coral and feed hungrily.
sentences.cn: 成年珊瑚聚集在健康珊瑚的剩余部分上，饥饿地进食。

sentences.en: As they flow south, the five rivers converge.
sentences.cn: 这5条河向南流，最终汇合在一起。

sentences.en: Hundreds of tractors will converge on the capital.
sentences.cn: 成百上千的拖拉机将向首都聚集。
